description: This file defines a service module for interacting with the HR API endpoints related to employee data. It includes functions to list, create, retrieve, update, and delete employee records, utilizing imported API client utility functions.

methods.name: listEmployees({ skip = 0, limit = 10, department, status, search } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of employees with optional filters such as skip, limit, department, status, and search terms.

methods.name: createEmployee(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new employee record using the provided payload.

methods.name: getEmployee(employeeId)
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific employee identified by employeeId.

methods.name: updateEmployee(employeeId, payload)
methods.description: Updates an existing employee's data identified by employeeId with the provided payload.

methods.name: deleteEmployee(employeeId)
methods.description: Deletes an employee record identified by employeeId.

ctags.name: listEmployees
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listEmployees({ skip = 0, limit = 10, department, status, search } = {}) {$/
